src:
Hasil Kualifikasi MotoGP Malaysia: Marquez Jatuh, Quartararo Rebut Pole
02 Nov 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Petronas Yamaha SRT, Fabio Quartararo, sukses mencatat waktu tercepat dan merebut pole dalam sesi kualifikasi (QP) MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pebalap Prancis ini diikuti oleh pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha, Maverick Vinales, di posisi kedua dan pebalap Petronas Yamaha SRT lainnya, Franco Morbidelli, di posisi ketiga.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Pramac Racing, Jack Miller, dan pebalap LCR Honda Castrol, Cal Crutchlow.
Pebalap Repsol Honda, Marc Marquez, akan start dari posisi 11, usai mengalami kecelakaan di Tikungan 2 saat berusaha membuntuti Quartararo.
Berikut hasil Kualifikasi MotoGP Malaysia 2019.
text:
Malaysian MotoGP Qualification Results: Marquez Falls, Quartararo Wins Pole
02 Nov 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yamaha SRT Petronas racer, Fabio Quartararo, successfully recorded the fastest time and won the pole in the qualification session (QP) Malaysian MotoGP at the Sepang Circuit on Saturday (2/11/2019).
This French rider was followed by Yamaha Energy Monster racer, Maverick Vinales, in second place and another Yamaha SRT Petronas racer, Franco Morbidelli, in third position.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were each occupied by Pramac Racing racer Jack Miller and Honda Castrol LCR rider Cal Crutchlow.
The Repsol Honda rider, Marc Marquez, will start from position 11, after having an accident at Bend 2 while trying to traverse Quartararo.
Following are the results of the 2019 Malaysian MotoGP Qualifications.
